Text.Page:
No, no, no!

Another analysis device broken? I hardly touched it! Vice Director Deresk will kill me if I request another!

Can you fix this {@LinkCreature:71#1110#analysis device}, or get {@LinkCreature:71#1108$$Adean} to do it?

(The {@LinkCreature:71#1110#analysis device} makes a grinding noise, and a strange violet liquid seeps from it.

It's definitely broken. Bring it to {@LinkCreature:71#1108$$Adean}, the equipment merchant.)

{@LinkCreature:71#1105$$Mienne}'s {@LinkCreature:71#1110$$analysis device}? Let's take a look.

Well no wonder. When was this last tuned?

Here, plug this into that socket over there. If it works, take it to {@LinkCreature:71#1102$$Deresk} and tell him not to skimp on maintenance.

Maintenance? Why?

Before I gave it to Mienne, I'd used it for four years and never had any problems with it!
